text:
Hi guys, I’m looking at using the Marketing API. I’ve noticed that there are 2 options to authenticate:
1. OAuth 2.0 and
2.  ApiKey
I’m not a fan of sending an api key in as a query string and would prefer to set a header instead for security reasons. Private Apps offer this option, but I cannot see the scopes in there for Subscription preferences.

Please advise.

If you got to settings then click integrations, there is an option for private apps, only super admins can created these. Should be available to all teirs according to <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/private-apps-are-now-available>
